name: NextTech Group
description:
NextTech Group of Technopreneurs is a Group of Companies pioneering into the emerging Digitized Commerce industry. Our Group currently comprises 40+ portfolios as a full value chain ecosystem and mostly focus on e-Commerce, Fintech (Payment and Credit) and e-Logistics with presence across South East Asia and the United States. 

We are the first and the only venture builder in the region where continuously creating digital startups to bridge the gap between merchants and users. 

PURPOSE: To FACILITATE consumer's everyday life through our own way of DIGITALIZATION

VISION: To become the most innovative DIGITALIZED Commerce group in South East Asia

SLOGAL: DIGITALIZE THE WORLD

Group MOTTO: Go Global or Go Home
